full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYES BU GSUM GYI LAM GYI RIM PA'I CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYI GTOD 'BUL DON CHEN LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA AER TE NI DA'I CHING GUNG GI SHOG CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGA' LDAN LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING DU, BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I CHO GA 'DZUGS RGYUR, SKYES BU GSUM GYI CHOS SKYONG GI GTOR 'BUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, DAD BRTZON LHAG BSAM DANG LDAN PA DGE BSKOS DGE SLONG CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BTZUN GZUGS DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS MDZAD DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA DRI MA MED PA 'DI HING PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
